title: Remove PID files — port-based process discovery

comment: PRE-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All verification items passed. FRONTMATTER: title='Remove PID files - port-based process discovery' (present, non-empty). revision_summary='Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1 executable document per SOP-001 Section 5.1 and SOP-002 Section 8). STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present. PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. Bracketed placeholders in Sections 10-11 are conforming execution-phase fields. TRACEABILITY: CR-062 referenced as parent - confirmed CLOSED v2.0. SOP-001 and SOP-002 referenced - both effective. TYPOS/ERRORS: None found. FORMATTING: Consistent throughout. CONTENT QUALITY: Purpose is clear; scope properly contextualizes the change; implementation plan maps cleanly to four EIs.

POST-REVIEW: NON-COMPLIANT. One deficiency found. DEFICIENCY: revision_summary field reads 'Initial draft' at v1.1. Per SOP-001 Section 5.1, revision_summary must be 'Updated each revision cycle to describe changes.' The v1.1 revision cycle added execution results to Sections 10 and 11 — this is not described by 'Initial draft.' The revision_summary must be updated to reflect the current revision cycle content (e.g., 'Execution complete — PID files removed, port-based process discovery implemented'). All other verification items passed: Sections 1-9 unchanged from pre-approved content. All 4 EIs show Pass with substantive summaries. Execution Comments document a pre-existing bug fix (transparent deviation). Execution Summary is complete. No VARs required. No remaining placeholder content. No documents affected beyond the CR itself. SDLC prerequisites N/A.

POST-REVIEW (Round 2): COMPLIANT. Previously identified deficiency corrected. FRONTMATTER: title='Remove PID files — port-based process discovery' (present, non-empty). revision_summary='Execution complete — PID files removed, port-based process discovery implemented' (corrected from 'Initial draft'; now accurately describes the v1.1 revision cycle). SECTIONS 1-9: Unchanged from pre-approved content. EXECUTION TABLE: All 4 EIs show Pass with substantive summaries and performer/date signatures. No Fail outcomes, no VARs required. EXECUTION COMMENTS: Pre-existing bug fix documented transparently. EXECUTION SUMMARY: Complete narrative covering all EIs and deviations. PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: None found. DOCUMENTS AFFECTED: Only CR-063 itself. SDLC PREREQUISITES: N/A. FORMATTING: Consistent throughout.
